title: Lol is Downloading super slow HELP!
body: So my lol patcher is downloading at 3kbps.. steam is downloading at 1mbps and i have tried everything i can think of.. im using an Optus hotspot to my ipad 4g and my home internet doesn't work either. It downloads at the same speed. Should i try reinstalling?

replies.body:
Hey there,

First off, stop tethering to a mobile connection, you're just asking for trouble.

* When you say your home connection causes you issues as well, are you using a wired or wireless connection?
* What company is providing your home connection, what is the rated connection speed?

http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support-oce/hExAdAiG-stuck-on-patching-and-crashes-after-a-certain-amount-of-time

Same issue for me, not sure what's going on, no response yet from any rioters or support staff. Hoping for one soon.
yeah me to.. it happens to me every time but when i go to my cousins house on a telstra ethernet it works so.. ???
